description:
Seimei tells Takeru of the events from a thousand years ago that led him to begin the World Whittle.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Change the Future on Your Own! Seimei, Across a Thousand Years
Temee wa Temee de Mirai o Kaero! Seimei, Sennen no Toki no Kanata de
テメーはテメーで未来を変えろ! 晴明, 千年の時の彼方で
